    • Uses of SayWhat in pokerapp.console.projectX

      Subclasses of SayWhat in pokerapp.console.projectX 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MacSayWhat
      Implements the SayWhat Text-to-Speech system for Macs.
      class  NullSayWhat
      A null implementation of SayWhat, for those platforms which we do not have a working TTS engine.
      class  WindowsSayWhat
      Uses JACOB on Windows to access the built-in TTS engine using COM Automation (IDispatch-based interfaces)
